00050 void CGpiQueryDlg::DoDataExchange
00051     (
00052     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00053     )
00054 {
00055     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00056     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_GPIQUERY_TXT_VERSION, mFileVersion );
00057     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_GPIQUERY_TXT_SIZE, mFileSize );
00058 }

00085 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 afx_msg LRESULT CGpiQueryDlg::OnGpiInfoReceived( WPARAM, LPARAM )
00093 {
00094     TCHAR versionString[33];    // 2 * 16 bytes + null terminator
00095     char  versionHex[33];
00096     uint8 versionLength = minval( mCom.mGpiFileVersionLength, 16 );
00097 
00098     memset( versionString, 0, sizeof( versionString ) );
00099     mFileSize.Format( _T(" %d"), mCom.mGpiFileSize );
00100     if( UTIL_data_is_printable( (const char*)mCom.mGpiFileVersion, versionLength ) )
00101     {
00102         MultiByteToWideChar( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, (char*)mCom.mGpiFileVersion, -1, versionString, versionLength );
00103         mFileVersion.Format( _T(" %s"), versionString );
00104     }
00105     else
00106     {
00107         memset( versionHex, 0, sizeof( versionHex ) );
00108         UTIL_uint8_to_hex( mCom.mGpiFileVersion, versionHex, versionLength );
00109         MultiByteToWideChar( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, versionHex, -1, versionString, sizeof( versionString ) );
00110         mFileVersion.Format( _T(" 0x%s"), versionString );
00111     }
00112     UpdateData( FALSE );
00113 
00114     return 0;
00115 }    /* OnGpiInfoReceived() */
